responsibilities: Developed, designed and advised trading platform with aggregates exchanges located around the world to generate passive income; designed several trading strategies i.a. arbitrage, market making, hedge, relative value; working with data teammates to optimize, backest and improve algorithms; managing fund portfolio;
Developed Know Your Customer web application for BNP Paribas which automates verifying the identity of clients and assessing potential risks of illegal intentions for the business relationship;
Took a part in development of JustDrive app for business to client model; developed user interface of car lease module;

Developed mobile navigation used by Polish Medical Air Rescue and Polish Air Force University pilots for iOS and UWP; this product competes with Jeppesen Aviator owned by Boeing; designed application architecture; adopted and extended Tangram-ES map rendering library; build product backlog items;
Developed secure decentralized messaging application for Android; designed end-to-end communication protocol based on Bitcoin network; developed another one Bitcoin wallet;

Developed web framework for over a dozen educational games;
